original_text: “As for the offerings that you offered in the cities of Judah and in the streets of Jerusalem, you and your fathers, your kings and your officials, and the people of the land, did not the Lord remember them? Did it not come into his mind?
korean_text: 너희가 너희 선조와 너희 왕들과 고관들과 유다 땅 백성이 유다 성읍들과 예루살렘 거리에서 분향한 일을 여호와께서 기억하셨고 그의 마음에 떠오른 것이 아닌가

sentences.original_text: As for the offerings that you offered
in the cities of Judah and in the streets of Jerusalem,
and the people of the land,
did not the Lord remember them?
Did it not come into his mind?
